website_summaries.verdict: A backpack that does it all, and with extra space.
pros: Great for the adventurous type that also needs to maintain digital connectivity
Not only water resistant, but scratch resistant as well
Positive reviews for both the size and design that doesn't put strain on one's back or shoulders
cons: May be too bulky for some

website_summaries.verdict: A stylish option for college students wanting something more refined to carry around.
pros: Backpack interior features 2 separate compartments big enough for large laptops and textbooks
Straps adjust to fit both average sizes for men and women
cons: Exterior mesh pockets offer little protection to keep items from being stolen

customer_reviews.title: Great for mini-backpacking trip through Europe
customer_reviews.text: This little backpack got me through 12 days of traveling Europe! I used a few space saver bags as well, but was able to bring 4 pairs of pants, 7 shirts, and 1 dress, then wore a few things twice. It held up really well throughout, and fit dimensions for WOW, Vueling, and EasyJet.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: This backpack looks small from the outside but it easily fits my 15
customer_reviews.text: This backpack looks small from the outside but it easily fits my 15.6 " laptop, ipad, 2" 3 ring binder, mouse, pens pencils and still has some room. It is lightweight and professional looking. I really like all of the pockets and storage options. I've only had it a couple of weeks so I am anxious to see how the fabric holds up. The fabric looks nice, more like a business suit rather than the plastic looking backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Billen

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ive ordered on Amazon all year
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best thing I've ordered this year. One thing to keep in mind is the black one is like dark grey. Super nice looking though. Padded like crazy for laptops. If you are looking for a business backpack like I was this is it.
customer_reviews.author: boltsfan52

customer_reviews.title: Straps come out of buckles and very little padding
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this backpack is lack of padding at the bottom and the tendency of the shoulder straps to pull free of the buckles. Several times when I loosen the should strap to put the bag over my shoulder, it has come completely out. The last time the bag went flying and damaged my laptop. That with the lack of padding on the bottom combine to make this a nice looking bag that has great potential to damage your computer. Would highly recommend spending a little more for better protection of your computer.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Missing Critical Feature
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the backpack seems very well made and has a lot of nice features; however, it is missing a critical feature for transporting laptops. It does not have adequate padding and an air gap underneath the laptop pouch. Without it, your device can be subject to accidental drops. I'm not suggesting that it should protect a fall from 3 feet, but at least a few inches. If this feature were to be added, it would bump up my review to 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zippers.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this at first but within 1.5 months of normal use two zippers on the same line have broken making the backpack unusable.
customer_reviews.author: DBark

customer_reviews.title: Bad zipper.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this bag. I was excited since it was light weight, waterproof, and could fit me stuff. Unfortunately, within weeks the zipper would come undone after zipping towards the bottom. I don’t know if I got a faulty bag but I’m not at all pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Suresh G Nair

customer_reviews.title: Pictures included
customer_reviews.text: Just got my bag today and I can say I am throughly enjoyed! I love the quality and the price. It has nice sturdy handles and fabric and lots of little pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Orr

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says in description
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I bought this backpack was so my husband had an easy way to charge his phone without needing an outlet. The backpack has to be plugged into to as usb and then has another USB port to plug your phone in. I thought maybe it just needed to be charged first, but nope, it has to be plugged in. Why wouldn’t you just plug in your phone then!? I’m sending back this stupid purchase!
customer_reviews.author: cassie paluskas

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March and one zipper already tore off plus the charging port stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Be aware that this backpack doesn't protect at all
customer_reviews.text: I sat my backpack down and a dent formed on my brand new 2018 Macbook Pro 15". There is absolutely zero padding in the laptop compartment unlike the description provides. I am beyond baffled at this backpack and the company behind it. I spent $3k on my laptop and this 'Durable' backpack was supposed to protect it. STAY AWAY! I am now reaching out to the company to see how they intend to handle the matter.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn-Wright Davis

customer_reviews.title: Made Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this back a month and the stitching in the zipper is coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this backpack. Took it on two flights and walked all over with it. It is just at the limit for TSA guidelines. Many pockets-I kept so much stuff in it and everything was in its place. No damage to things. Lightweight and sturdy. No regrets at all. This was meant for travel but I think I'll use it for work too because I'm so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela A.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this just before a trip to ATL and it was awesome to travel with. I got stranded overnight in Houston on my way home and it was fantastic to have the charging port. Of course, the portable battery is a separate investment but definitely worth it. The pockets are plentiful but the perfect amount. Too many is a bad thing, in my opinion. The security pouch is a little short, but fit my letter sized wallet and iPhone 8plus well enough. Definitely recommend. **Update*** I’ve had the backpack 3 months now, have only traveled with it once, and use it only back and forth to work and one of the straps is already tearing and separating. Super bummer
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It ripped in under 1 week. Poor qualiy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the backpack but it ripped on the first trip I went on. My last backpack lasted me over 5 years. This one ripped in 1 week. 12 Month Update: I ended up using a safety pin to close the rip for about 12 months and I chose to just deal with the problem assuming I would eventually purchase something else. That time has now come. 1 year later the zipper has separated from the backpack and is unusable now. It really is a shame... I loved the layout of the backpack. Build quality is just awful.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pinegar

customer_reviews.title: Great for College and a Professional Look
customer_reviews.text: I have seen no problem with the backpack's stitching or any tears with it as some other reviewers had. I definitely contemplated buying this because of those reviews, but luckily it arrived in perfect shape and I couldn't be more happier. The side drink holders does well to keep my 32oz Simple Modern Ascent Water Bottle and my Early 2015 Macbook Pro 13-Inch (as seen in the picture).
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack, one considerable flaw
customer_reviews.text: This backpack seems to be well made, with plenty of storage and good quality metal zippers. The one flaw is the lack of padding on the underside - if you put a laptop in the laptop carrying sleeve, it will likely *bonk* the floor when you set it down "normally" (you could also solve this by laying the backpack on its back on the floor, but who does that?). The design would be easily upgraded to 5-stars if they added a thick strip of protective padding on the bottom of the laptop sleeve. For me, it was easily fixed by layering a very thick winter sock in the bottom of the laptop sleeve - no more bonk, problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: You always get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is total trash. I used north face backpacks in the past. They would last for number of years. This backpack however is going to be returned after one use! The zipper slides make noise when you’re moving around. Feels like an adult cow bell following you around. Whatever I had in my previous backpack barely fit here. Last but not the least. I was walking around with my gear. Both zipper slides were on top of the back back,not on the side. As I was walking around, the weight pushed the slides around and the entire backpack opened up. Brilliant. I’d youre using this backpack for pencils and crayons it would do the job.
customer_reviews.author: ilya mirz

customer_reviews.title: Visually appealing but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Great looking backpack but does hold up to the everyday wear of a teenage boy. I bought this for my middle school teen. It's great looking. But it lasted 2-1/2 months before one of the zippers broke and one of the straps started coming loose. It's definitely not durable enough to hold heavy school books. UPDATE: I have changed my rating on this backpack from a 1 star to a 4 because the Seller was kind enough to contact me and offer a replacement backpack. That I find very outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed though it was a good bag
customer_reviews.text: The handle of the bag isn't very strong. I don't really lack much in the bag but it's torn already. Happened in a moment where I can't send the bag back. Disappointed though it was a good bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MY LAPTOP BROKE WHILE IN IT
customer_reviews.text: I researched ALOT on best laptop backpack carrier and finally chose this one & sooo excited to take on my flight. I hung the backpack on bathroom stall and it fell down smashing my laptop screen 😞 ...you never look for products with padding ON THE BOTTOM OF BACKPACK..so sad as its quite alot to fix the screen. I would not recomend this backpack as it truly should safely keep your laptop in all directions should it not????
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a trip abroad and I used this backpack as my personal carry on. It's roomy, fashionable, durable and functional. The best feature in the backback is the hidden zipper pocket where I was able to keep my passport and wallet and not worry that someone might pull it out. Everything was safe, had a place and was easily accessible. It was a little bulky looking when I had a filled it before my trip but that was to be expected. Overall, I was very happy with this backpack and would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: The USB port outside and the cable inside the second last large zipper is unique and I like the fact you can charge your phone if there ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek design with multiple zipper pockets from small, medium, and large. There is a USB port outside of the backpack and a usb cable inside the second to last large zipper, which is unique and I like the fact you can charge your phone if there is another usb outlet connected to it. There is a zipper pocket on the back of the shoulder strap which is good to put my headphones and sunglasses. The two web pockets on the side for water bottle is nice to have. I can fit my rain gear, lunch bag and laptop in different zipper pockets in this backpack is a huge plus for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lani37

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Material.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this backpack for months now and has held up really well. Still has a new backpack smell to it. As I am a college student, I carry around a lot of heavy books, etc. Really love it and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Was a great back pack for the plane
customer_reviews.text: Was a great back pack for the plane. Good compartments and protective area for my 15.6" laptop. Not bad for the price, but I only gave 3 stars because the zipper on the most outside pocket broke after 1 month of medium duty use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E

customer_reviews.title: Shipped Bent in Half - Ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: Just received this backpack, and it is shipped bent in half. The back padding is destroyed and takes the form of the bend. Why?? Who thought it was a good idea to store/ship a backpack like this? Other than this important issue, the material seems alright... Not the toughest, but you get what you pay for at this price. It also smells like some toxic material straight out of the plastic bag, but that's besides the point.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: 3 zipps
customer_reviews.text: Backpack seem great if it didn’t have three zipper on one opening. I feel like it’s such a pain to make sure you only zip one side and if you don’t your backpack is left flying open when you think you closed it. And it’s no point in locking the two zips together when you can still get into the backpack with the third 🙄 customer service couldn’t replace it only issue a refund. And I have to return the backpack and re order a new one. It’s one big hassle when I might just take the return and go back to my old backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and bulky, don't buy this just for anti-thief
customer_reviews.text: The only thing anti-theft about this heavy, bulky, uncomfortable backpack is cut-resistant. If you want full anti-theft, spending a little more money at AAA Store, for example. They have the backpacks that are much harder for pick-pocket to do anything (like zipper lock). Since the anti-theft feature of this bag is minimal, why pay the premium and carry the extra weight? May as well double the usual cheaper backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Lilian Love

customer_reviews.title: It is a great backpack for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a great backpack for the price. Nonetheless, I returned mine because I noticed that the Laptop compartment does not have protective pads in the bottom, VERY BAD DESIGN! That was one of the reasons why I was looking for a new bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I like all the pockets and room the backpack provides. Additionally the USB charging port is a must at times. The handle on the top of the bag is versatile and the straps are fairly robust. All in all this bag is nice. However, there seems to be NO padding between the laptop compartment and the bottom of the bag, the laptop compartment has already ripped (had this bag less then 6 months) and the heat doesn't flow as easy as you would think. Good bag if you are gentle and don't travel a lot with your computer. If you a constantly on the go and lug your laptop...choose another bag.
customer_reviews.author: GWJr

customer_reviews.title: Not for Nursing Students
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a nursing student with heavy books don’t bother buying this... I got this in the mail 38 days ago and the left strap is already starting to tear away. Im going to try and contact the seller for a refund. Edit: the seller got back to me promptly and offered to either send another or refund. good customer service. I think for anyone other than nursing students this is a good backpack to buy
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough for serious full time college student
customer_reviews.text: I gave this three stars because for my purposes it was WAY TO SMALL. I have no idea how many people are using this for college. They must be putting one class at a time in there. I had trouble putting my notebook, 2 in 3-ring binder, pencil bag, planner, and highlighters in there. The bag was not tall enough and the binder was really hard to zip over. HOWEVER, it is a good quality bag. Zippers are nice, and the bag is heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie M Wedan

customer_reviews.title: Laptop zipper is a dangerous liability!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the larger size for airplane travel. While it fit everything nicely, has plenty of ideal compartments and is super lightweight, the laptop compartment zipper slides open, no matter where you position the zippers, top or to the side. A few times the zippers just slid open and my laptop came flying out. Laptops are way too expensive to risk using this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for travel, or day-to-day use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag primarily for travel and it worked great. It protected my laptop well, and there was a lot of room for things like my power cord, snacks, and a sweater. It has little pockets inside the larger pockets for great organization. My favorite thing about it, however, is how well it distributes weight. I am very petite and this back was so comfortable. The only downside is that it can get a little hot on your back. But, that is only because it is well padded (which is great to protect your laptop and increase overall comfort).
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my 15.6" laptop
customer_reviews.text: It was good but could hardly close the zip with the laptop inside. I tested both my 15.6" Dell and lenovo laptop and it was the same problem. Even if I closed the zip, i was afraid it would scratch the laptop or if that corner would bump into something. So, had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: No laptop protection
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice basic backpack, but there is little to noooo support for a laptop. There is absolutely none on the bottom, and if you drop the bag down, it’s landing on exposed laptop first.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEE
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY love this backpack. Everyone I’ve showed it to has also liked it. It’s made of good quality and is waterproof. It rained on the way to my car today and water just rolled off. There are many pockets for all my stuff and the thickness of laptop pocket is great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Landry

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold a 15" Dell Inspiron in the designated computer sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack for my daughter to carry her new Dell Inspiron in for a competition. Technically, it "barely" holds the laptop in the main compartment (not the padded computer sleeve) with the zipper extremely tight around the corners of the laptop. When you put the laptop into the laptop sleeve so that it is properly padded, the corners of the computer stick out past the zipper. If the corners were less rounded, the computer may have fit.
customer_reviews.author: K. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Lacks in the small details
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack for work and travel. Missing some important aspects that a great pack should have Pros: Love the color choices Perfect size Good organization Cons: Materials feel cheap Organization pockets week My biggest gripes are, Shoulder straps are to thin to wear this pack for any amount of time No chest strap The last 2 cons are what really made me return this pack. If you are looking for a pack in this size range then look at the Tigernu Travel Laptop Backpack. Awesome for the size, features and money.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Soward

customer_reviews.title: nice carrying handle
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive backpack, well padded in the right places, nice carrying handle. The pockets are lined which makes it a bit heavier, but my previous bag turned sticky, not from anything I put in it. The coating on the fabric deteriorated and was a mess. I don't expect that to happen with this bag. Pockets are well planned, and the whole bag is well thought out. I love the water bottle pockets. My 24 oz. cycling bottle fits fine. Heavy-duty zippers.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and compact
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about this backpack is that it has a level of water resistance and is compact. It is as light as a feather when carry around but sturdy enough to withstand normal usage when commuting with it. I opted for the camo color and it looks awesome! You are able to fit a wide variety if things in here, which can include: - a laptop (tested on Dell XPS 9370) - iPad Pro (tested on iPad Pro 10.5) - water bottles (tested with 32oz glass bottles) - standard lunch items - chargers for your devices - keys, headphones, newspapers, etc So far I an happy!
customer_reviews.author: BJ1517

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to carry my things for work and class. Easily fits everything I need with tons of room to spare (laptop, iPad, books, chargers, etc.). Also has a hidden pocket where I can keep more valuable things (such as my wallet or emergency money). I live on a fairly large campus (almost a mile round trip for some classes), and this bag does not get uncomfortable at any point even if I'm carrying multiple textbooks as there is ample padding on the shoulders and lower back. It also comes with a convenient charging port that I can hook up to a portable charger, which has saved me several times already.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Mumaw

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Fit a 15.6" Dell Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had found the perfect backpack. I liked it in every way. Then I put my 15.6" laptop in the laptop pocket. When I tried to zip the pocket shut, I had to force the zipper around the corners of the laptop. When I finally got it zipped, the top corners of the laptop pushed out against the backpack and I was worried that it would make the zipper bust because it was so tight. Had to return it and find another solution. If my laptop was smaller, I would have definitely kept it because I liked everything else about it. Product listing is inaccurate though, because it says it will fit a 15.6" laptop. It doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Koheleth

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, a little small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the compartments and the back facing storage for passports and a flat wallet. It’s a nice bag with a lot of compartments. It’s small though, coming back from our cruise ended up having to pack one adult tshirt, one adult pair of basketball shorts and one small child’s shirt and shorts. These were rolled tight for the packing and made this bag bust at the seams and very tight to wear and get things in and out of, even the passport compartment. Really sucked at the airports because of how tight it got. Otherwise, it’s a nice bag for compact flat items. I’ll use this for day trips and work travel. I’ll get another bag for vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Backpack is great and can handle my laptop and all the paperwork that I have to travel back and forth to work with during this pandemic. Weight is evenly distributed. My only issue is that the straps don’t keep the length setting. They seem to be too slippery (for lack of a better word) and they slide back up to full extension of the straps. It isn’t difficult to adjust, just a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ixi's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great for commuting, usb port lacks speed and is a bit uslesss.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack for commuting. I commute via train and walk about 1.5 miles to and from the train station. This backup holds my laptop, an extra pair of shoes, a portable small umbrella and my coffee tumbler and water bottle in each of its own elastic pouches. The usb charging port is a great idea however the mechanism provides a very slow charge. The usb cable and port that is built into the backup can not charge today's devices at full speed. I need to use my own usb cable that connects to my portable charger in order to charge at full speed. That's the only downside of this bag.
customer_reviews.author: NDSports

customer_reviews.title: Best college backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack!! It looks just like it does online. Plenty of space for books. In mine currently I have 2 books (I have had 4), a 2” binder and a 1” binder, my surface laptop and charger, pencil case, and sometimes a change of clothes. So yeah, lots of room in this backpack. Also, all the other backpacks I’ve had make the shirt I’m wearing ride up on my back. It’s like the friction of the backpack against my shirt makes the shirt go up and show the skin of my back. This backpack DOES NOT do that. It sits nicely on my lower back and my shirt stays down in the process!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Inside Pocket Ripped
customer_reviews.text: I've had this backpack over a year, but one of the pockets in the bag ripped a few months in. I use this bag to carry my laptop and other essentials back and forth to work, and I have brought it on multiple long-distance trips out of town. It has very convenient compartments inside, and I like that the laptop section has it's own isolated section inside the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: SynnaBuy

customer_reviews.title: Great for business and travel!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great for everyday business and business travel. It's compact, yet, surprisingly roomy. I love the charging area too. I had a portable charger that I hooked up and it works perfectly. I also love that there is an external pocket under that charging port so you can hook up and be on the go. I highly recommend this bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Wojteczko

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend if you need the arm straps longer
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first time it was used. Second time the arm strap came unthreaded causing the bookbag to fall of back and laptop hitting the airport floor. Now it continues to come unthreaded. Reached out to customer service about the life time warranty and never heard anything back after giving them pictures and the order number. Would not recommend or buy again. Had to makeshift it to stay with a safety pin but this of course won’t work when we need to fly with it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had many backpacks, each of which is lacking in one way or another. This is the first one that meets ALL of my needs. I couldn’t be more pleased. Size: medium, unobtrusive for more formal occasions, stands up by itself, yet big enough to hold what I need. Construction: well made, strong zippers, comfortable handle and shoulder straps. I especially appreciate the strap that slips over a suitcase handle and the strap to hang the backpack on a coat hook (especially good in restrooms!). Having the device-charging hookup is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jude1938

customer_reviews.title: Great as a carry-on
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a pack for to use while on vacation. Mostly as a carry-on for the flight. The bag is a great size (fit with room under the seat) and has soft padded handles/straps and a outer charging port (you supply the battery). It had several large compartments, which I used to keep electronics/cables separate from my quart bag of fluids and separate from things I'd need in flight (such as reading materials and Clorox wipes). There was a space for everything and it kept me organized, with anything I needed accessible within a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Rando

customer_reviews.title: Matein Laptop Backpack - Perfect For Business and Everyday Use!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a professional environment and need the perfect bag for business travel and day-to-day lifestyle. I've tried the shoulder bags, computer bags, and cheap backpacks - but all eventually failed me. If you are in the same position, this is the perfect bag for you! Even though this bag is considerably inexpensive, it is absolutely everything I need a bag to be. So many compartments, bottle holders, and adaptable charging station - it is amazing. I love being organized and also feeling comfortable carrying everything. If you're contemplating this bag, I suggest you go ahead and "treat yo self"!
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: Um, this thing rocks.
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. It has plenty of space, yet doesn't feel or look to big. I love having the USB charger on the outside, and I just always keep a power bank hooked up on the inside. The strap on the back is very convenient when traveling with a suitcase - all you have to do is slide the strap over the suitcase handle and it makes it easy to transport. I really like the key clasp in the front pocket as well. It makes it easy to find my car keys whenever I need them. I always feel like I can find an extra pocket in this backpack if I need one.. It's great. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Monahan

customer_reviews.title: A quality backpack that won't let you down.
customer_reviews.text: I think this backpack is great. I switched from a terrible laptop bag to a backpack when it finally bit the dust. This thing has pockets all over the place and stuff (like straps or mini pockets) that help organize your stuff in the pockets. My X1 Carbon fits in it perfectly. It seems to hold up great to weather although I'm sure you can't just leave it outside in the rain. It is very light and the included charging port is handy. I've used it to haul a days worth of clothes and my laptop across the country and few times for short work trips and I think it is pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Krasmer

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5
customer_reviews.text: The backpack seems very well made, and hopefully durable. There are a couple of areas with which I am not thrilled. Admittedly one criticism may be a matter of personal preference or familiarity. The various compartments (sections?) are designed a bit differently than my old one. I may find this design is better or as good, but my initial thought was, "What were they thinking. The biggest complaint if you want to call it that, is the capacity figure of 15.6". I have a 15" 2 in 1 that only fits with significant effort. Hopefully, the material will stretch a bit with use. If not, the integrity of the seams and zipper are in question. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: JacksOne

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: One of the zippers broke within the first weekend of use, although the pack was not fully loaded. Do not buy. Very attractive, but not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Djhrick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but skeptical.
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice. It's very cushiony. It looks durable. There's compartments for everything in my life. I haven't used it yet. I was excited to see there's a "lifetime warranty" on the label. However, when I went to the website, they say that the warranty is only for defects, not damages. Now, I've had some backpacks that are really strong and last for years(Jansport) and other backpacks that have only lasted for a few months. I am hoping that this bag is as durable as a Jansport because that warranty doesn't look like it's much of a help. I recommend buying the warranty that Amazon offers, just in case something happens. I'll buy that warranty as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: A good backpack until the zipper failed.
customer_reviews.text: I had the backpack for slightly more than a year before the main compartment zipper failed. Afterwards that zipper would randomly come apart (not unzip). The backpack's water resistance is slightly more than a cotton t-shirt so you better put stuff inside the pack in plastic bags. The external USB connector for a powerbank (use your own powerbank) is a nice idea BUT the wires are so thin as to let very little power flow. I liked the way the backpack rode on my shoulders even when fully loaded. The durability of the backpack's straps and shell are EXCELLENT. I would still be using the backpack today if the main compartment zipper hadn't failed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Horton

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack on Prime Day because my other cheap (less than $30) backpack was falling apart. I didn't have high expectations with this backpack because of its cheap price, but it is made of nice materials that will hopefully stand the test of time. I love the numerous pockets it has. Overall, it is a great backpack so far! If anything happens to it in the future, I will update this review. So, if there is no update, this backpack has still held up! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this backpack. Very sturdy, tons of space - My son needs to carry a laptop, charger, 2 large binders, lunch box, water bottle, pencil pouch and many other personal items to school (especially now, as with COVID-19, our school discontinue the use of personal lockers), so was looking for a large backpack to hold all and still be comfortable. I think we hit the jackpot with this one and the Built-in phone charger is an added bonus. The color (we ordered blue) is gorgeous. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: K.g

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best backpack I've owned
customer_reviews.text: As someone who leads a busy life and is always on the go, I carry a literal ton in my backpack. Prior to purchasing this backpack, all other brands (regardless of price point) would have broken zippers and straps within six months. However, this backpack has exceeded my expectations: not only is it sturdy and more than capable of handling everything I carry, it has amazing weight distribution. Sometimes, it doesn't even feel like I have anything on my shoulders! While I haven't yet used the phone charge port, it is a great feature that I plan to test out shortly. This backpack is absolutely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Longenberger

customer_reviews.title: No padding for laptop (on bottom)
customer_reviews.text: No padding on the bottom of the laptop compartment. This means if you lay the backpack down vertically, your laptop is essentially touching the ground. Not ideal. I'm either going to return it, or modify it to add padding to the laptop sleeve. Seems like a really obvious design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack, best one I have found. Holds so much, school folders, and plenty of room for my laptop. This will be great for traveling also it has so many pockets. It will be much easier to carry on a plane than a laptop bag. I also love that the shoulder straps are padded so it makes it very comfy to carry and not hurt your shoulders. I would highly get this backpack it you are a student, or someone who has to carry your computer and a lot of folders it is so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: princess julie

customer_reviews.title: It will NOT fit a 15 inch laptop as (falsely) specified
customer_reviews.text: My laptop is exactly 15 inches, and while it might fit inside the laptop sleeve, the bag will not zipper around it. Not even taking it out of the laptop sleeve and using just the rear compartment will not fix the issue. The bag is simply too small to accommodate a standard laptop. Now, if you've got a smaller computer (say 14 inches or smaller) and you're only using the bag to get back for everyday use it's great. It has a lot of organizer pockets which I liked plus room for a few books and possibly a light sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Trish L.

customer_reviews.title: Sale price made a great buy even better
customer_reviews.text: I got the Austere Gray when it was on sale for $18.29 and I feel like I got a great product at a great price. When I showed my husband what I’d ordered he asked me to order one for him. We both LOVE our new backpacks. Great for work or play. He uses his for both work (carrying his tablet & phone, pens, notebooks, books, etc. as well as charging the devices on the go) and play (he loves that it holds his drone, controller, case etc. while also recharging the drone’s battery). I’m using mine for day trips, camping, hiking, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Christy L

customer_reviews.title: This bag saved my trip. Such a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a life save for my trip to Europe. I crammed it full of all of my electronics. •Canon dale camera with 2 extra lenses •iPad mini •2 large power cells •a book •my Sony over ear headphones STILL IN THEIR CARRY CASE. •Neck pillow •go pro and a ton of accessories And it still had space to go. It has a built in usb cable to attach a battery bank to, and two large pockets to put power banks securely in. The laptop section is heavily padded as well. Top notch bag, glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Soto's Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this before?! I have been killing my back for years at work. I really love the amount of compartments and bought a portable charger to use the exterior built-in USB. I traveled to Europe for work purposes, long distances and packed a lot of stuff: laptop, charger, safety glasses, computer glasses, sweater, documents, gifts, snacks, vest even sandals! I just feel it runs slightly small for a 15" laptop but so far it is still good without any marks of wear or damage. My other complaint is that my husband but another one in the same color and now we need to differentiate with color ribbons; hey! there are other colors!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for a laptop, usb cable, machine washable, and ruggedly strong. I've washed this seven times and the actual power distribution still works. My only complaint that the bottom should have more padding. Overall, it's amazing. I use this to exercise and charge my phone while I do house work. Tip: backpack is fine but if you add bubble wrap at the bottom, your devices will be so safe. More likely, use the packaging bubbles to prevent bouncing.
customer_reviews.author: si.yrxkrru1t3177Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: love how many pockets and features are available.
customer_reviews.text: I draw a lot and, I like to keep a strangely large amount of pens and, brush pens on me. This organizes that art supply jumble wonderfully. I am also not too concerned if my pens leak, material seems like it would contain that to each compartment. I can carry a laptop, sketchbook, ipad, art supplies, credit cards, several books, my soul, etc in this, all at the same time. Tried similar backpacks but all have had terrible stitching. This has sturdy stitching. I'd cuddle this thing at night, whisper sweet nothings to it, and roll around with it how comfy it fits. Now can me and my backpack be alone please.
customer_reviews.author: pitts

customer_reviews.title: Taken it all over the world.Holds a ton and put locks on zippers to prevent pick pockets.
customer_reviews.text: I waited to use this backpack and give it a solid try before reviewing. And I love it. I can't believe how much stuff you can fit into it yet still get the slim look, due to it's design. One feature that others haven't mentioned, which I use and love is THE ZIPPERS HAVE HOLES FOR SMALL PADLOCK WHICH I USE FOR INTERNATIONAL TRAVEL TO PREVENT PICK POCKET THEFT. I took this bag to Spain, Portugal, and Africa. It helps to have those zippers locked to help deter a quick pick pocket. While I didn't think I'd ever use the power bank feature, I think I'll try it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: ... saw a few other posts about how it smelled bad, but honestly thought people were making too big ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw a few other posts about how it smelled bad, but honestly thought people were making too big of a deal. Well.. I was wrong. It really did smell bad on the inside. I tried to spray Febreeze and used some dryer sheets, but nothing helped. Everything I put in the backpack smelled, too! It was really cute and seemed well made, but I truly couldn't get past the smell and just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H

customer_reviews.title: Smaller backpack with lots of room for a laptop, iPad, etc.
customer_reviews.text: The backpack met my expectations for my needs. There is lots of room for my IPad Pro with Magic Keyboard, cables, extra batteries for power on the go. There are mesh pockets on both sides for water bottles or whatever might fit the pocket. Also, one section has a keychain holder, area for pens, markers, small notebooks. There are also several pockets numerous with enough room for everything you might need for a day’s commute or similar use. Nice backpack for the money. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, especially for airport travelers
customer_reviews.text: Have it in red, like color. Still looks like new after at least couple of 24 hrs long trips. Perfect for traveling on flights and having all you need for a long one with you. I push it into my feet space for a flight. Quite converneint to reach for anything. The compartments help to organize and separate zippers help to find the stuff right away. Laptop pocket is very safe. I also push my kindle into it, works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lenok

customer_reviews.title: Gotta give credit where it's due
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the package, first impressions: feels high end, comfortable, fits me perfectly (was worried it would look small, I'm 6'1, 220lbs), tons of different compartments. I shoved in there my laptop (which has a case, makes it about 16-17") some books, some accessories, a water bottle. It holds a ton. Old backpack broke this morning before class. I ran to target for a replacement, too expensive (we're talking like $89.99, and still felt cheaper than this bag). I ran to try Walmart, a bunch of junk. Quickly went on Amazon while I was still at walmart, and it just got delivered at 6PM. Only took 8 hours lol, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Richter

customer_reviews.title: Tons of space, lightens the load
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! I’m a full time college student with a lot of classes and tons of textbooks/notebooks to haul around and this backpack has been a life saver. My old backpack was worn and tearing and the zippers no longer worked so it was time for an upgrade. This backpack is amazing. SO MUCH SPACE for all my school crap. I have 3 notebooks, a planner, and anywhere from 5-7 school books in there at a time and it holds it all as well as being lighter than my old backpack with the same amount of stuff. Makes hauling everything around campus so much easier. And I really like the shade of blue, it’s very nice
customer_reviews.author: Chyrsten

customer_reviews.title: This bag is a must have for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bag for almost 2 years, and I have to say it’s by far the best bag I’ve ever had. Durable, and can fit A LOT of items in here. I travel very frequently for personal and business and this bag is always my go-to. I got it for the designated laptop slot and USB port on the outside. To this day, I still haven’t had any problem with either. Your laptop is also VERY easily assessable. The only con I see with it is if you do have more heavier items, it can *sometimes* sag in the bottom. But that might just be me filling it past it’s intended weight. Other than that, best bag ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kodi

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for city commutes.
customer_reviews.text: Walked almost 50 miles in NYC with this bad boy. I would say the external USB port paired with a battery bank is an amazing feature, especially while traveling. I kept a fair amount of stuff in this bag along with an umbrella. I will say that it was fairly water resistant. The weight of the things in my bag for upwards of 12 hours a day, the straps were pretty good as far as cushion goes. I had a bit of soreness in my shoulders after 4 days wearing this puppy, but all in all, I would wear this bag 10/10 everytime I have to walk 50+ miles in NYC in the rain/cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McCrimmon

customer_reviews.title: Good traveling bag for business that is made with good materials.
customer_reviews.text: I normally have an iPad and at least one work laptop with me when I travel. I can fit all my cables, power adapters, backup power supply and assorted cables in this without any problem. It has pockets for passport, international drivers license, and an assortment of all the odds and ends for international business but doesn’t look like a student or backpacker’s bag (in a sport coat, it looks just fine). It’s holding up well so far and the zippers are smooth and don’t snag on anything either. Good price for a good product so far....
customer_reviews.author: The Dude13

customer_reviews.title: Started traveling for the first time last November... this backpack has been thru it all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for school last fall, then I took it with me for my very first travels. It saw the Santa Monica sands, Los Angeles sun, Oregon trails, Portland food stands, Seattle skyline, Space Needle views and it's going with me to go see the Atlantic Ocean in the spring & hopefully, international seas soon. It's been jammed, crammed and scrammed under airport seats, on city buses, and gym lockers but it still looks amazing. 10/10 would do again. It's durable, VERY roomy and colors stay the same.
customer_reviews.author: Lana0021

customer_reviews.title: I've only had the backpack for a few days, but I'm very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the backpack for a few days, but I'm very happy so far. The materials feel durable, the zippers are very smooth and do not give the impression they will cause future grief, there are plenty of pockets and compartments, the cushioning/ventilation system on the back is thoughtfully done, and it looks good. I was also impressed that the email sent by the company did not ask me for a five-star review, but simply offered themselves as open to any concerns or questions I may have. I will update as I use it, but for this price if it lasts me for at least three years then I'll be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wiltshire

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack but needs extra padding for laptop
customer_reviews.text: I really like the overall quality of this backpack. I used it on a recent trip to San Francisco, and the bag easily held all of my essential items. The straps, carrying handle, and a couple other areas of the bag are nicely padded for comfort when wearing / carrying the bag. However, I seriously wish there was more padding at the bottom of the laptop compartment. Most times when I placed my bag on the floor, I would be startled by the sound of the hard laptop case hitting the floor. I will need to figure out a DIY solution to add extra protection at the bottom of the bag so that I don’t damage my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: NowIGetIt

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I travel across the country for work and this backpack is amazing for traveling. So much dove for various things. This was bought so I don’t have to bring so much on the plane as a carry on. I can just use the backpack as opposed to my carry on suitcase and another backpack or bag. Feels like it was made with care and thought. I did buy the warranty with the bag because backpacks will tend to rip regardless what brand. I don’t see an issue with this backpack in that regard. Night recommend
customer_reviews.author: Adam Midura

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag so far. The size is a good bag for a weekend trip, or for a taking it out during the day. It has a lot of pockets and slots to organize things. I especially like the hidden zipper pouch where the bag meets your lower back. The material and zippers seem like an OK material, nothing remarkable but should last a while. The bag is surprisingly heavy for the size. Not like the bag is excessively heavy or anything, I just expected it to be a little lighter when compared to other bags I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A.

customer_reviews.title: Great value - Happy with my choice
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this pack. Zippered pockets - lots of places...hidden and not. There's a place to attach your keys in one of them...which I appreciate. I love bright RED and this is a cheer red! I like that it allows for a charger, though I haven't yet needed one. I carried two PC's in it today without a problem. The zipper pull could be improved, but it isn't a deal-breaker. It has a tendency to fall over when I don't have anything in it...but it isn't a big deal. I am glad I bought it and it is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Forth!

customer_reviews.title: A great bargain for a really good backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this backpack on two trips now: three weeks in Europe (with planes, cars, and trains) and two weeks along the US west coast (with trains, bus, and cars). I am really pleased with it. It holds an impressive amount, with well-placed pockets. It's lightweight, comfortable to wear, and slides over a suitcase handle. I especially like that it easily stands upright. And after a fair bit of dragging around, it still looks brand new. It makes the perfect way for me to carry my laptop, chargers, and other things I want to keep close at hand. Due to the low price, I was a little skeptical when I first bought this backpack, but now I'm truly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: dephal

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the security pocket zipper!
customer_reviews.text: The most important pocket did not survive a 10 day London/Paris trip! The zipper came apart on day 7. Which rendered the security pocket useless. Bad thing is I purchased this well in advance of our trip and the return deadline has passed. I am going to try and get an exchange, if successful I will update. Update June 27 2019 I searched for the maker of the Matien backpack and could not find them. I contacted Amazon and my new back arrived to yesterday!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my briefcase which was a pain since it only had one strap. Since I travel for work a lot, that's a real issue. This one is great, nice looking material that seems sturdy(I've only had it a month) It holds it's shape, so even though I'm holding it, I don't have to fight it to put something in a pocket that already has stuff in it. I like the 2 handles on top, one you can use t carry with your hand, it's cushy and comfortable, and the other is sturdy nylon that you can hang on a door and not worry about ruining the handle you use for carry. Nice all around.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morgey

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering goods from Amazon couples year but never leave bad reviews but this product quality is terrible. The stitching around bag handle almost fall apart . I tried to give them another chance by ordering second one with the hope that I could get a better quality back pack but it turns out to be worse sorry I am trying to tell the truth to consumers to be aware of low quality backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: After taking this out of the packaging I was skeptical on how comfortable this would actually be. Wow was I surprised! I can fit 2 laptops (dell and a macbook) and it is still wicked comfortable to wear for long periods of time. I can't believe how much stuff I can fit in there and it not feel like I am wearing a brick on my back. The added USB charging port is a major bonus as I use my phone a lot can hardly have an outlet to charge. I love it so much, I showed it to a coworker and went and bought him one also and he is loving it also!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack for work. I have pens, glasses, keys and that kind of stuff in the front zippered section. I have some paperwork in the back, and in the middle compartment, I put snacks or anything else I need in there. The straps are holding up well, as well as the zippers. I haven't used it for travel, but I use it daily and it is working great. I like the charging port but haven't really had to use it yet. Back packs can be expensive and so far, this backpack is working like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This back pack is a STEAL for the price! It holds everything I need it to and more! I'm one of those teachers that luggs her work to and from home daily. This backpack has helped me reduce my load from 2 bags to 1. It has so many compartments that I am able to carry personal items along with work stuff. I have seen other reviews and want to try using this backpack for travel. I love the option to charge my phone while I'm commuting. IT DOES NOT COME WITH A CHARGING BANK, but i'm not phased by it because I already own one.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Small but Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised how organized I can keep all my pens, pouches, makeup, tech devices with chargers, battery, plugs, laptop, writing pads, and other necessities neat. I love all the little compartments! It's all in the details like the compartment behind for important documents. The ability to lock the zippers is a nice addition; there's also a hook for keys, which I need because I'm always losing mine, lol. There are two drink/bottle holders. I use this backpack for work, school, and travel. It's perfect as a carryon item! It's also surprisingly sturdy considering the size. I've been using it for months now on a daily basis. I would order this again!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: This backpack rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great purchase. I’m slightly OCD, so I tend to obsess over things that go wrong or lack of clear organization and my last backpack gave me anxiety every time I used it since it only had one section so I’d have to shove everything in there together, with this backpack I’ve been able to complete organize everything, from my MacBook, iPad, chargers, school books, pencils, womanly toiletries, writing utensils, etc so now I can grab what I need in a matter of seconds instead of having to search into a dark abyss of disorganization. I haven’t bought a power bank just yet so I can’t attest to its functionality, but I’ll update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Yos

customer_reviews.title: Very nice backpack.
customer_reviews.text: This is a mid-sized backpack. We bought it trying to shave some weight when boarding Norwegian Air to pass the 10Kg carry-on limit. It weighs a 1.5 lbs (compare to 2.5 lbs large backpack). It's very rugged and functional. It expands to pack a bunch of stuff. I was able to carry battled water, two large, heavy jackets, battery charger, power bank, umbrella, IPAD mini, and a couple of sandwiches. Particularly like the hidden pocket in the padding for valuables.
customer_reviews.author: A Ray of Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: this seems like a well thought out backpack
customer_reviews.text: While the purchase is new and has not been used (where can you go with coronavirus), the backpack has many features including zippered pockets, a rear zippered 'money' pouch that rests against your back when you are wearing the pack, a large main compartment with a sleeved area for a laptop and a way to charge your phone or other device off a stored battery (that you provide) inside the pack. I am looking forward to the space and versatility of this pack. It is a little more expensive than other packs, but it seems worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Acaman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I love the stability, storage pockets, color and texture of the fabric, and comfortable straps. This is a great backpack. I got it for my 16” MacBook Pro and it fits perfectly. There’s so much extra room and I actually ran out of items to put in it as they all have a place now, and there’s still extra pockets. I can see how someone would also use it for backpacking in say Europe or something. You can squeeze in extra clothing or camera equipment. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: DebbieB

customer_reviews.title: Great School Backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son (8th grade) picked this out for this upcoming school year. Due to Covid, there will be no lockers so it was important to get a backpack that was big enough to hold everything (binders, notebooks, I-pad, lunch, etc.) but at the same time not be too heavy. This backpack fit the bill. It is well made and lightweight; the compartments make it easy for him to organize his materials; and everything fits without cramming. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best work backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I work in 3 different clinics and this backpack holds well!. It can hold my TAL 24oz water bottle and my 16oz Contigo to go mug in each side pocket. They do not slip out as it has leeway. It has enough pockets for everything I need ( 2 binders (1inch and 2 1/2inch), iPad with keyboard case, chargers, pencil bag, snacks etc) very comfy and durable material. I really like the little charge port as it works well for my Anker. I Love the front pockets for extra socks, pens and ID. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Teal

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for international trip!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews that indicated it fits a lot of things easily while traveling. It did! I'd been having trouble finding a good backpack that I could easily slip things like iPad (with travel case), purse, magazines, toiletries, charging cords, etc etc without having to take everything out to get to something. This pack has generous slots that were easily accessible throughout my long, multi-country travel. Was comfortable to wear, and I like the strap that allowed me to place it on top of my suitcase handle through airports as well. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

product_meta.title: Travel Laptop Backpack, Business Anti Theft Slim Durable Laptops Backpack with USB Charging Port, Water Resistant College School Computer Bag Gifts for Men & Women Fits 15.6 Inch Notebook, Grey
feature_bullets: ★LOTS OF STORAGE SPACE&POCKETS: One separate laptop compartment hold 15.6 Inch Laptop as well as 15 Inch,14 Inch and 13 Inch Macbook/Laptop. One spacious packing compartment roomy for daily necessities,tech electronics accessories. Front compartment with many pockets, pen pockets and key fob hook, make your items organized and easier to find

★COMFY&STURDY: Comfortable airflow back design with thick but soft multi-panel ventilated padding, gives you maximum back support. Breathable and adjustable shoulder straps relieve the stress of shoulder. Foam padded top handle for a long time carry on

★FUNCTIONAL&SAFE: A luggage strap allows backpack fit on luggage/suitcase, slide over the luggage upright handle tube for easier carrying. With a hidden anti theft pocket on the back protect your valuable items from thieves. Well made for international airplane travel and day trip as a travel gift for men

★USB PORT DESIGN: With built in USB charger outside and built in charging cable inside,this usb backpack offers you a more convenient way to charge your phone while walking. It's a great tech gift for him from wife, daughter and son. Please noted that this backpack doesn't power itself, usb charging port only offers an easy access to charge

★DURABLE MATERIAL&SOLID: Made of Water Resistant and Durable Polyester Fabric with metal zippers. Ensure a secure & long-lasting usage everyday & weekend.Serve you well as professional office work bag,slim USB charging bagpack,college high school big student backpack for boys,girls,teens,adults

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars18,678 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
